ModMetaData.name: Unlimited Precept Name
ModMetaData.author: Ripmorld
ModMetaData.description:
Huge amount of help was given from discord users like Taranchuk#0853 (who basically provided more than half of the mod's code) \n and legodude17#1717 erdelf#0001 Wiri#9897 handholding me through the rest of C#
You should now again to be able to make your relic/ideology/God's name as long as you wish. \n Note this mod will not be responsible for crashes of Rimworld when you copied the entire Moby Dick into it as a relic name.
And I am never , ever , going to try mess with Transpiler again
